document.full_text: the state of maryland plans to sue the company that operated a gas well that ruptured in pennsylvania, spilling fluids into a fresh water tributary that eventually flows into the chesapeake bay, maryland's attorney general said on wednesday.
document.title: maryland prepares lawsuit over pa gas drilling effect on water
lines_and_colors: the state of maryland plans to sue the company that operated a gas well that ruptured in pennsylvania, spilling fluids into a fresh water tributary that eventually flows into the chesapeake bay, maryland's attorney general said on wednesday.
